name: WooCommerce Order Test
author: WP Fix It

sections.description:
A testing payment gateway for WooCommerce to see if your checkout works like it should. You can complete a full and real checkout on your site to see if everything is running smoothly. Runs for admin users only.
Easy setup and and SUPER EASY testing!

Brought to you by WP Fix It
Back when we started our business in 2009, there were very few companies that were specializing in WordPress Support. It was mostly freelancers that built WordPress sites and then had to support them.
* Resolved our 1st ticket in 2009
* Average resolve time 30 minutes or less

BEST REASONS TO USE THIS

  • Quickly know if your checkout is working or not
  • Complete a full and real checkout with no payment

short_description: Make sure your checkout works. Test your WooCommerce order process in seconds.
